mapper.select: select * from REVIEW WHERE PRODSEQ = #{prodSeq} order by SCORE desc
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW (reviewseq, prodseq, cusid, score, title, content, regdate) values (reviewseq.nextVal, #{prodSeq}, #{cusId}, #{score}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update REVIEW set SCORE=#{score}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} where REVIEWSEQ=#{reviewSeq}
